title: Aromatherapy — LIVING LOTUS NATUROPATHY
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy — AROMATHERAPY — Aromatherapy is the therapeutic use of plant essential oils to harmonise mind, body and spirit. Aromatherapy is mainly practiced externally in conjunction with massage, reflexology and acupressure. Aromatherapy can be used to treat a range of common ailments as the oils can be massaged into the skin, inhaled or used in a bath.
